51-year-old.context: This is a 51-year-old gentleman here with his wife.

loud snoring.context: She confirms the history of loud snoring at night with witnessed apnea.

witnessed apnea.context: She confirms the history of loud snoring at night with witnessed apnea.

moderate sleep apnea.context: The result of the sleep study was reviewed. This showed moderate sleep apnea with significant desaturation.

significant desaturation.context: The result of the sleep study was reviewed. This showed moderate sleep apnea with significant desaturation.

large tonsils.context: At the office, we observed large tonsils and elongation and thickening of the uvula as well as redundant soft tissue of the palate.

elongation and thickening of the uvula.context: At the office, we observed large tonsils and elongation and thickening of the uvula as well as redundant soft tissue of the palate.

redundant soft tissue of the palate.context: At the office, we observed large tonsils and elongation and thickening of the uvula as well as redundant soft tissue of the palate.

tortuous appearance of the septum.context: A tortuous appearance of the septum also was observed.

CPAP.context: The patient was unable to tolerate treatment with CPAP.

Afrin drops.context: Afrin drops were placed in both nostrils and a cottonoid soaked with Afrin was placed in each side of the nose.

cottonoid soaked with Afrin.context: Afrin drops were placed in both nostrils and a cottonoid soaked with Afrin was placed in each side of the nose.

Crowe-Davis mouth gag.context: A Crowe-Davis mouth gag was placed.

electrodissection technique.context: The tonsils were first removed using electrodissection technique.

hemostasis.context: Hemostasis was achieved with the electrocautery and with sutures of 0 plain catgut.

electrocautery.context: Hemostasis was achieved with the electrocautery and with sutures of 0 plain catgut.

sutures of 0 plain catgut.context: Hemostasis was achieved with the electrocautery and with sutures of 0 plain catgut.

Marcaine with 1:200,000 epinephrine.context: The tonsil fossae were injected with 0.25% Marcaine with 1:200,000 epinephrine.

uvulopalatopharyngoplasty incision.context: The planned anterior soft palate incision was marked out with the electrocautery from the left anterior tonsillar pillar rising upwards and then extending horizontally across the soft palate to include all of the uvula and a portion of the soft palate, and the incision then extended across the midline and then inferiorly to meet the right anterior tonsillar pillar.

septoplasty incision.context: A #15 blade was used to make a left cheilion incision.

mucoperichondrium and mucoperiosteum ele.context: Mucoperichondrium and mucoperiosteum were elevated with the Cottle elevator.

deflected portion of the septal bone res.context: With Takahashi forceps and with the 4 mm osteotome, the deflected portion of the septal bone from the vomer was resected.

nasal septal mucosal flaps sutured.context: The nasal septal mucosal flaps were then sutured together with a quilting suture of 4-0 plain catgut.

inferior turbinates outfractured.context: The inferior turbinates were then both outfractured using a knife handle, and now there was a much more patent nasal airway on both sides.

Polysporin ointment.context: Polysporin ointment was introduced into both nostrils.

estimated blood loss.context: Estimated blood loss was about 15-20 cc.
